LandingPageHeader.title: Welcome to Our Service
LandingPageHeader.description: Learn how we can help you achieve your goals.
LandingPageHeader.footerText: Â© 2024 Xin Chao Company. All rights reserved.

Hero.Make life in Taiwan easier and convenien: Make life in Taiwan easier and convenient
Hero.description: Our company provides house and room rental services for foreigners living, studying, and working in Taiwan. We are committed to providing the best service and experience to our customers.

Features.All services comply with legal regulatio: All services comply with legal regulations, clear and transparent.
Features.We offer a wide range of services to mak: We offer a wide range of services to make your life more convenient
Features.You can customize services to your prefe: You can customize services to your preferences or personal style
Features.We offer a wide range of products and se: We offer a wide range of products and services for you to choose from

ProductInfo.CoreProductDesc: 100+ houses and rooms for rent throughout Taichung.
ProductInfo.In the future: In the future, we aim to expand our presence across Taiwan to serve all foreigners living in the country.
ProductInfo.ReasonablePricesDesc: We always provide products and services at the best prices in the market.
ProductInfo.FounderDesc: XinChao will assist foreigners living, studying, and working in Taiwan in easily finding a suitable house or room that matches their personal preferences and budget.
ProductInfo.AvailableRentalLocationsDesc: We are always searching for the best living locations for our customers.

Testimonials.title: Loved by rent people
Testimonials.A beautiful, spacious, and airy house, l: A beautiful, spacious, and airy house, located near the market with all necessary amenities nearby.
Testimonials.A spacious room surrounded by all necess: A spacious room surrounded by all necessary amenities, fully equipped with essential items, and offered at a reasonable price.
Testimonials.A beautiful, spacious room with a clean: A beautiful, spacious room with a clean kitchen at a reasonable price.

Pricing.title: Pricing for service
Pricing.A basic room, suitable for one person: A basic room, suitable for one person.
Pricing.Spacious room with all necessary ameniti: Spacious room with all necessary amenities.
Pricing.Fully furnished, suitable for multiple o: Fully furnished, suitable for multiple occupants.
Pricing.note: The price above does not include brokerage fees.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.What fees do I have to pay when signing: What fees do I have to pay when signing a rental agreement?
FAQ.The fees that customers need to pay when: The fees that customers need to pay when renting a house are a two-month security deposit, one month of rent, and a one-month brokerage fee.
FAQ.How long can I sign the contract for?: How long can I sign the contract for?
FAQ.The minimum rental period is 6 months, a: The minimum rental period is 6 months, and the maximum is one year. Upon expiration, if the customer wishes to continue renting, they can sign a new contract.
FAQ.How will the utility costs be calculated: How will the utility costs be calculated when renting a house or room?
FAQ.Utility costs will be calculated based o: Utility costs will be calculated based on the meter or according to the contract terms. If the customer rents a room, the cost will be divided equally among the tenants. For houses, the tenant is responsible for all utility costs.
FAQ.What identification documents are requir: What identification documents are required when renting a house or a room?
FAQ.When renting a house or room, customers: When renting a house or room, customers need to provide their passport, ARC (Alien Resident Certificate), or other relevant ID card, passport, or Government ID card of the guarantor.
